oai_dc:dc.dc:title: VALENCE FLUCTUATION IN THE DILUTE EU SYSTEMS EU-RPD2SI2, EU-RCU2SI2, AND EU-RNISI2 (R=LA, Y, AND YB)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATIL, S
NAGARAJAN, R
GODART, C
KAPPLER, JP
GUPTA, LC
PADALIA, BD
VIJAYARAGHAVAN, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mixed-valence
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eu-151 Mossbauer and L3-edge measurements have been made on dilute europium alloys Eu0.05Y0.95Pd2Si2, Eu0.05Yb0.95Pd2Si2, Eu0.05La0.95Cu2Si2, Eu0.05Yb0.95CU2Si2, Eu0.05La0.95NiSi2, and Eu0.05Y0.95NiSi2. We show that Eu ions exhibit valence-fluctuation phenomena in all these hosts. The valence of Eu ions in these hosts seems to be governed by their respective nearest-neighbor distance rather than unit-cell volume. Deviations from this behavior are pointed out and discussed.
